mapper.sql: a.id, a.yanyu, a.geyao, a.gushi, a.jinji, a.qiyu, a.dancantuce, a.content, a.pic1, a.pic2, a.pic3, a.pic4, a.video1, a.video2, a.video3, a.video4, a.created, a.updated, b.id AS "category.id", b.name AS "category.name"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO area_content ( category_id, yanyu, geyao, gushi, jinji, qiyu, dancantuce, content, pic1, pic2, pic3, pic4, video1, video2, video3, video4, created, updated ) VALUES ( #{category.id}, #{yanyu}, #{geyao}, #{gushi}, #{jinji}, #{qiyu}, #{dancantuce}, #{content}, #{pic1}, #{pic2}, #{pic3}, #{pic4}, #{video1}, #{video2}, #{video3}, #{video4}, #{created}, #{updated} )
mapper.update: UPDATE area_content as a SET a.category_id=#{category.id}, a.yanyu=#{yanyu}, a.geyao=#{geyao}, a.gushi=#{gushi}, a.jinji=#{jinji}, a.qiyu=#{qiyu}, a.dancantuce=#{dancantuce}, a.content=#{content}, a.pic1=#{pic1}, a.pic2=#{pic3}, a.pic3=#{pic3}, a.pic4=#{pic4}, a.video1=#{video1}, a.video2=#{video2}, a.video3=#{video3}, a.video4=#{video4}, a.updated=#{updated} WHERE a.id= #{id}
